name: I'dBWR
description:
Controllers:
[ F11 ] - Full Screen (Web Browser)
[ SPACE ] - Jump
2x [ SPACE ] - Double Jump
[ L SHIFT ] - Speed / Dash
[ R ] - Restart

Part of Junior Programmer Pathway at Unity Learn: Bonus Features III. 

The prototype was created for educational purposes only,
feel free to watch the gameplay.

I challenge you to experience it or even become our coffee machine gun. 

All donations will support the near development of new gaming experiences
and are shared among contributors.

Stay in touch & support... 🔫 ☕ ;)
